      • testGetDistanceToSegmentKm1

        public void testGetDistanceToSegmentKm1()
        The test position should return the closest distance to the segment when it's perpendicular to the segment.

      • testGetDistanceToSegmentKm2

        public void testGetDistanceToSegmentKm2()
        The test position should return the distance to the closest segment end when the intersection falls out of the given segment. In this test the position is closest to the first point of the segment.

      • testGetDistanceToSegmentKm3

        public void testGetDistanceToSegmentKm3()
        The test position should return the distance to the closest segment end when the intersection falls out of the given segment. In this test the position is closest to the second point of the segment.

      • testGetDistanceToSegmentKm4

        public void testGetDistanceToSegmentKm4()
        Test the position when the segment's start and end points are identical. In this test the position is closest to the both the start and end points.

      • testGetDistanceToSegmentKm5

        public void testGetDistanceToSegmentKm5()
        Test the position when the it lies on segment. In this test the position should return 0 since it lies on the line.

      • testGetDistanceToSegmentKm6

        public void testGetDistanceToSegmentKm6()
        Test the position when it lies outside of the segment but in line(great cirle path) with the two segment points. In this test the position is closest to the second segment point.

      • testGetDistanceToPathKm1

        public void testGetDistanceToPathKm1()
        The test position should return the closest distance to either a segment point or segment intersection on the path. The path constitutes several valid Position's. In this test the point is closest to the first segment.

      • testGetDistanceToPathKm2

        public void testGetDistanceToPathKm2()
        The test position should return the closest distance to either a segment point or segment intersection on the path. The path constitutes several valid Position's. In this test the point is closest to the first segment start position .

      • testGetDistanceToPathKm3

        public void testGetDistanceToPathKm3()
        The test position should return the closest distance to either a segment point or segment intersection on the path. The path constitutes several valid Position's. In this test the point is closest to the second segment.

      • testGetDistanceToPathKm4

        public void testGetDistanceToPathKm4()
        The test position should return the closest distance to either a segment point or segment intersection on the path. The path constitutes several valid Position's. In this test the point is closest to the second segment end position.

      • testIsOutside1

        public void testIsOutside1()
        Test when a position is outside a given region consisting of several joining points. In this test the region is a roughly square region consisting of four segments or eight Positions. The test position is outside the region but within minimum distance in km.

      • testIsOutside2

        public void testIsOutside2()
        Test when a position is outside a given region consisting of several joining points. In this test the region is a roughly square region consisting of four segments or eight Positions. The test position is outside both the region and the minimum distance in km.

      • testIsOutside3

        public void testIsOutside3()
        Test when a position is outside a given region consisting of several joining points. In this test the region is a roughly square region consisting of four segments or eight Positions. The test position is on the region path.

      • testIsOutside4

        public void testIsOutside4()
        Test when a position is outside a given region consisting of several joining points. In this test the region is a roughly square region consisting of four segments or eight Positions. The test position is within the region path.
